articles.title: Chauvin trial verdict: Jury deliberations resume as nation awaits decision in landmark case on policing in America - The Washington Post
articles.description: Jury deliberations continue in the trial of Derek Chauvin as the nation braces for a verdict in the case of the former Minneapolis police officer accused of killing George Floyd.
articles.content: The jury of 12 people six White, four Black and two multiracial watched as both sides on Monday played back the viral footage of Chauvin kneeling on Floyd for more than nine minutes until the 46-year… [+5577 chars]

articles.title: After a deadly year on the roads, states push for safety over speed - News-Medical.Net

articles.title: Half of US Adults Have Received at Least One COVID-19 Shot - DTN The Progressive Farmer
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) -- Half of all adults in the U.S. have received at least one COVID-19 shot, the government announced Sunday, marking another milestone in the nation's largest-ever vaccination campaign but leaving more work to do to convince skeptical American…
